file.name: registration.openapi.yaml
file.content:
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud User Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the Schul-Cloud User service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  schemas:
    registration_input:
      description: todo
      type: object
      properties:
        classOrSchoolId:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        pin:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9]{4}$'
          description: to confirm email.
        password_1:
          type: string
        password_2:
          type: string
          description: to confirm password. should be equal to password_1
        email:
          type: string
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName:
          type: string
        birthDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        importHash:
          type: string
        userId:
          type: string
          pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        parent_firstName:
          type: string
        parent_lastName:
          type: string
        parent_email:
          type: string
        privacyConsent:
          type: boolean
        termsOfUseConsent:
          type: boolean
        parent_privacyConsent:
          type: boolean
        parent_termsOfUseConsent:
          type: boolean
    registration_response:
      description: response for a successful registration.
      type: object
      properties:
        account:
          type: object
          properties:
            _id:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            __v:
              type: integer
            activated:
              type: boolean
            createdAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            updatedAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            userId:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            username:
              type: string
        consent:
          type: object
          properties:
            _id:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            consentStatus:
              type: string
              enum: ['ok', 'unknown', 'missing']
            requiresParentConsent:
              type: boolean
            parentConsents:
              type: array
              items:
                type: object
                properties:
                  form:
                    type: string
                    enum: ['analog', 'digital', 'update']
                  source:
                    type: string
                  dateOfPrivacyConsent:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
                  privacyConsent:
                    type: boolean
                  dateOfTermsOfUseConsent:
                    type: string
                    format: date-time
                  termsOfUseConsent:
                    type: boolean
            userConsent:
              type: object
              properties:
                form:
                  type: string
                  enum: ['analog', 'digital', 'update']
                source:
                  type: string
                dateOfPrivacyConsent:
                  type: string
                  format: date-time
                privacyConsent:
                  type: boolean
                dateOfTermsOfUseConsent:
                  type: string
                  format: date-time
                termsOfUseConsent:
                  type: boolean
            userId:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
        user:
          type: object
          properties:
            _id:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            id:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            createdAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            updatedAt:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            email:
              type: string
            features:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            forcePasswordChange:
              type: boolean
            firstName:
              type: string
            fullName:
              type: string
            lastName:
              type: string
            parents:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            preferences:
              type: object
            roles:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
            schoolId:
              type: string
              pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
paths:
  /registration:
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/registration_response'
        '400':
          description: bad request - invalid input
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Registers a new user. This route is to be called at the end of a registration process.
        It requires a valid importhash for a user object created by a school admin, as well as a valid registration pin recieved via email.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - registration
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/registration_input'
openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: registration
    description: A registration service.
